Articles.Content:
Rest in peace, old sig.

This is what it looked like:

YAY, an LV-909!

Also, I'm a good friend.

Goodbye, old sig.

Cheers to the old sig, rainup9.

EDIT2: The old sig dies once again.

Edited February 11, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER
It's a very nice sig Raincrafter, I can tell you spent a lot of time on it
I remember when Mods murdered my old sig..... my new one is a memorial....
You know you cannot fit a megatiger into a forum signature, it just won't go

I would make an actual signature for myself, but my GIMP skills are absolutely terrible/rubbish/hokum/non-existent. At least i'm okay at making up half-decent quotes!

Ah what the heck. Spending another hour mismatching weird blobs I made can't hurt.

*goes back to GIMP*

EDIT: Well, now I made a tiny little button thing, for when I finally make a Mission Report.

Edited January 11, 2015 by Norpo
I gave up and just have a text only sig.
Heh, I don't think my gimp skills are so good either.
Gotta love them ribbons!

Gimp actually has some excellent tutorials. Ya'll should check them out.

http://www.gimp.org/tutorials/
The Comic Sans makes me cringe, but otherwise it's pretty good.

The Comic Sans makes me cringe, but otherwise it's pretty good.

Well, Comic Sans is an infamous font. Just thought it would actually look good there.

Edited January 11, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER
My sig is nice, but I want to extend it so the goldcrest won't be cut off.
Eh, I got someone to make my sig, because I'm horrible at it.
Oh, raincrafter, I will attempt at remaking your sig in my style, just because I am bored.
I had a great sig, but it violated the rules.

Well, Comic Sans is an infamous font. Just thought it would actually look good there.

It's a perfectly fine font and it's a good one when applied to places where it fits. It doesn't fit on tombstones, for example.

My old signature was but I got tired of it and decided to make a new one (which is my current one). Guess what program I used to make it? That right! I used PowerPoint.

Before that, I had this:

Oh, it turns out that my current signature has been viewed 103,660 times according to Imgur. It's also the most-viewed image on my account.

Edited January 12, 2015 by mythbusters844
103660views103662me

I used to have ribbons in my signature...

Then they went away.

Wondering why I made the Forum BBCode tutorial? Let me show you. Here's my signature.

hah. My sig doesn't have a big and awesome history. I just had a simple text sig with the quote and a link to the challenge. Then I thought of adding a link to Kountdown. Then I thought that a link would probably not be enough. So I asked around in #KSPOfficial what people thought should be on kd's avatar, fired up gimp and threw together a pretty button. And since having a button and a link looked pretty ugly, I made a butto for the challenge, too.

Mine was something like:

Your engine are on fire?

Go full throttle: the faster you get out of the atmosphere, the faster the fire will stop
I have a good sig, gif by awesome guy, and shameless self-advertizing!
